channel.title: freebsd on Accessible Minimalism
channel.description: Recent content in freebsd on Accessible Minimalism

item.title: Grass roots OS
item.description: I deal with a fair few vendor products on a daily basis so here’s to list making. To be fair the Extreme switches aren’t touched that much maybe because they’re too Extreme but most likely because I don’t deal with things connected to them. Vendor Router OS Donor OS Donor OS Owner Donor OS Website Juniper Networks Junos OS FreeBSD Internet Community freebsd Juniper Networks Screen OS n/a n/a Cisco IOS-XR QNX QNX Software Systems QNX Cisco IOS n/a Proprietary n/a Cisco IOS-XE IOS, Linux Hybrid (ASR) n/a Cisco Modular IOS IOS, QNX Hybrid (6500) n/a Cisco NX-OS Linux Monta Vista mvista Extreme ExtremeWARE Linux Internet Community xoslinux Redback SEOS NetBSD Internet Community netbsd Update: Since posting this, Juniper have release the QFX series which has Freebsd and Junos running within a VM that sits on top of Centos.
